QuestData.Title: Blending In
QuestData.Description: Sage Aeire has finished the shroud. Take it with you and travel to the Temple City of En'kilah. Don the cloak within the city's bounds to hide yourself from most of the Scourge there. This will be our best opportunity to gather information about the enemy's fortifications and leaders.$B$BWhile wearing the cloak, scout the three large spires on the grounds of the city. While the shroud will shield you from most of the Scourge, the En'kilah abominations will be able to find you if you get too close.
QuestData.LogDescription: Chieftain Wintergale at Taunka'le Village wants you to wear the Imbued Scourge Shroud in the Temple City of En'kilah and scout the Spire of Blood, the Spire of Pain, and the Spire of Decay.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you finished scouting the temples in the Scourge's fortress?
QuestData.RewardText: <Chieftain Wintergale listens as you describe your observations.>$B$BThe information you've gathered will help us to plan our assault on the Temple City. We'll need to find a way to defeat the officers you identified and get into that necropolis.
